#summary addXXX(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [update update()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with the name of an association you have set up through [hasMany hasMany()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- a "hasMany" association from "owner" to "car" is required --->
<cfset anOwner = model("owner").findByKey(params.ownerId)>
<cfset aCar = model("car").findByKey(params.carId)>

<cfset anOwner.addCar(aCar)>
=
<cfset model("car").update(ownerId=params.ownerId)>
}}}
